# QWAMOS Module Map - Generated by Artemis Pipeline
# Date: 2025-11-22
# Version: v2.0.0

## Core Modules

crypto/              - Post-quantum cryptography (Kyber, ML-DSA-87, ChaCha20-Poly1305)
hypervisor/          - VM management, KVM integration, resource management
kernel/              - Linux kernel, initramfs, KVM modules
bootloader/          - U-Boot with ML-DSA-87 signature verification
storage/             - Post-quantum encrypted storage volumes
network/             - Network isolation, VPN, Tor/I2P integration
cluster/             - Multi-device clustering framework

## AI/ML Modules

ai/                  - AI assistants integration, threat detection
ai_app_builder/      - AI-powered application builder
ml/                  - Machine learning threat detection models

## Frontend/UI

ui/                  - Flutter hypervisor UI
frontend/            - Web frontend (if exists)
keyboard/            - SecureType keyboard with PQ crypto

## Security

security/            - QR authentication, panic wipe, audit logging
tools/               - Crypto tools, signing, key generation

## Android Integration

android/             - Android app integration
vms/                 - VM configurations and templates

## Infrastructure

reproducible/        - Reproducible build system
sbom/                - Software Bill of Materials
tests/               - Test suites
.github/workflows/   - CI/CD pipelines
